summary: Sweeney's department store was having its twentieth anniversary celebration on May 3rd. The store was planning an enormous sales promotion with discounts in various departments. Workmen were busy preparing the store by creating signs, displays, and shelving for the sale products. A newspaper campaign was planned to feature the sale products. The store owners hoped to attract customers and give away door prizes on each of the seven floors.
quotes: in_order_to prepare the store workmen were moving busily around carrying lumber and sawing and hammering
they were planning to give away door prizes on each one of the seven floors
